sub_title: HR Project Manager Digitisation HR Processes a.i., available from March 2022 via Compagnon
summary:
I am available for an new assignment as HR Project Manager or HR Business Partner from March 2022 via Compagnon.

Honesty, integrity and a good sense of humour are traits that describe my personality.

Who I am as a consultant...

I think along and ahead with you and give you clear advice. When you implement your plans you can count on me to be by your side. Knowing what moves people and being sensitive to the different interests involved, I help you see matters from diffent perspectives. This is how we achieve the best results.

Who I am as a trainer/coach…

I help you connect your business goals with your personal goals, so you are drawn to your own, valuable success at double the speed. As a trainer I use the group dynamic to lift every individual to a higher level as well as the group as a whole. 
My business experience, continuous education and overcoming significant events in my personal life, have formed me into an authentic trainer and coach with a unique outlook on this profession. I enjoy training groups as well as coaching individuals.

My experience overall:

10 years broad HR experience as a consultant/coach
11 years managing, motivating and coaching teams		
13 years developing and giving training courses and individual life and business coaching
15 years managing change in various organisations
15 years living/working in an international environment
16 years project and process management
25 years account management, customer service and consultancy 

Training courses:
• Business Consultancy Skills
• Labour Law
• Agile Scrum/Lean principles
• Storytelling

Coach certificates:
• Certified Brainmanagement Mental Welness Coach
• Licensed Master Practitioner of Neuro-Linguistic Programming 
• Certified Life Coach 
• Social and Emotional Intelligence Coach Certificate
• Motivational Coach Certificate

education.degree_name: Licensed Master Practitioner of Neuro-Linguistic Programming
education.field_of_study: NLP = a wide set of techniques that can be used to communicate and function more successfully
NLP = a wide set of techniques that can be used to communicate and function more successfully
(Highest level of highschool in the Netherlands)

profile_positions.description:
In this role I give advice on how current HR processes can be improved and digitised. I am responsible for the digitisation of the main HR processes in the HR system Motion (supplier Centric) and the implementation of these new HR processes in the organisation. 

Achieved results are:
•	Technical setup and implementation of the employment module, the document generator, the digital signature and the digital personnel file in Centric's HR system Motion.
•	Redesign of all main HR processes, including recruitment and selection, in-, through- and outflow and external hiring.
•	Initiated the digital change by introducing digital thinking, working in a chain with uniform processes and through behavioural interventions.

The main goals of this assignment are:
•	Realising qualitative and quantitative gains for the internal customer (employees and managers) in HR processes and services. Examples are:
o	faster lead times for HR processes
o	fewer steps in these processes 
o	clear deadlines  
o	role clarity 

•	Decreasing the operational workload of the HR department by implementing more efficient HR processes. This gives the HR department room to be more proactive, to take on more of a business partner role and thus better serve the organisation. 

•	Improving the collaboration, efficiency and continuity of the HR administration by realising uniform HR processes and working methods. This improves ways of sharing the work load and replacing each other in case of absence.
profile_positions.title: HR Project Manager Digitisation HR Processes a.i.

profile_positions.description:
As HR Project Manager I am responsible for:

-	Effectuating the cloud migration of the Visma HR application.
-	Replacing the current recruitment application by Visma Easycruit.
-	Optimizing HR processes regarding recruitment and selection, in-through- and outflow.

This involves everything from preparation to implementation including stakeholder management and after care. In this project I manage a multidisciplinary project team.

I introduced a Kanban way of working in order to make the project backlog and the prioritisation of the different items visible. This way of working also helps to complete current project tasks before starting new ones.

During this project I am also the funcional manager of the HR administration team. In this role I work with my team on improving collaboration and sharing of the workload and increasing effeciency. I also focus on clarifying the role of the HR administration in the HR processes en improving the connection between the different (support/HR) roles.
profile_positions.title: HR Project Manager a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Advisor to the Board of Directors and (Cluster) managers on HR matters such as in-, through- and outflow, absenteeism, managing (non) performance and role clarity, cooperation and decision-making in a context of self-organization.

Other roles I took on:
- Advisor/Coach in complex cases such as conflicts, dismissal cases.
- Advisor/Manager of projects, such as compliance with privacy legislation, reorganisations.
- Trainer/Coach for further professionalisation of the HR Team regarding change, cooperation, HR policy, HR processes, stakeholder management.
- As SCRUM Master I introduced and successfully implemented an Agile/SCRUM/Kanban way of working in the HR department.
profile_positions.title: HR Consultant a.i.

profile_positions.description:
Advisor and sparring partner for one of the Managing Directors, his department managers and team leaders for a wide range of HR matters. 

In this role I:
- gave advise on issues such as in-, through- and outflow, sustainable employability, managing (non) performance, strategic personnel management, continuing changes after a reorganisation.
- mediated in conflicts and dismissal cases.
- acted as a case manager in long-term absenteeism cases.
profile_positions.title: HR Consultant a.i.

profile_positions.description:
I advise senior management in the business on a broad spectrum of HR topics, such as:

Leadership development, change management,  lifetime employability, learning and development, performance management, absence management,  team development, collaboration topics, recruitment, employee engagement.

In this position I work for the ING Sales department and the international, agile IT department. I fulfill 4 roles:
 
•	Coach
•	Consultant
•	Project manager
•	Portfolio manager

I am also a member of a think tank where I am developing and presenting an agile collaboration model for HR.

As an interviewer/selector I contribute to large reorganisations to bring about change towards the agile way of working.

Regularly I am hired as a trainer/developer/facilitator wherever I am needed in the business or in HR programmes. 

I am a coach in the programme "unknown talent", with the goal to enhance the chances for employees with some sort of employment limitation. The goal is to focus on talent and to create a win-win situation.
profile_positions.title: HR Business Consultant/Trainer/Coach

profile_positions.description:
As a Consultant Customer Experience/Formula Manager of the HR click and call channels I was the linking pin between these channels and the experts of HR. I positioned this new advisory and guiding role in the HR organisation.

I was responsible for optimizing customer experience at the HR call center and the HR intranet site. These channels served 20,000 ING colleagues in the Netherlands on all sorts of HR topics.

I used the valuable input of our internal customers and the expertise of our HR experts to continuously improve the effectiveness and efficiency of these channels and to improve the customer processes.

In 2014 I focused primarily on the call channel as a Consultant Change and Education/Trainer. In this position I was a member of the management team of the HR call channel and as such: 

•	guided them through the change towards becoming a real advisory channel
•	developed the educational concept for HR call advisors, made a concrete plan, took care of stakeholder management, started the implementation and turned it over to line management. 
•	gave educational advice and training sessions on: personal development and culture, knowledge of the organisation and target groups, knowlegde of products, processes and IT systems, and excellent skills.
profile_positions.title: Consultant Customer Experience, Change and Education/Trainer

profile_positions.description:
I help people broaden their horizon, (re)discover their talents and drives, set goals, make a plan and take action while I am:

- Coaching employees and managers towards taking the next step in their career. 

- Training groups/giving workshops in order to create positive movement within people and to increase lifetime employability in the organisation.
profile_positions.title: Career Coach/Trainer/Consultant Employability and Learning

profile_positions.description:
Being the developer and HR-trainer in the the pilot of  the project "the new world of work". 

This pilot was the start of a completely new way of working. The new world of work makes it possible for people to be more flexible in choosing where and when they work.  However, the biggest change will take place within each person involved. On the one hand employees will experience more freedom which in return requires them to take on and show more responsibility and planning skills. On the other hand managers will need to focus more on the end results and trust their employees to make the right choices in how to achieve these. Also the manager will need to keep the team spirit alive with everyone working in different locations and at different times.  

Therefore, the new manager will be more of a coach and the new employee will be more of an entrepreneur. An optimal working relationship between them requires integrity, trust and honest and open communication.
profile_positions.title: Trainer/Coach/Developer for the project "The new world of work"

profile_positions.description:
Developing an entire training programme for call agents in 3 call center locations regarding sales, communication and personal development.

Being a trainer for the call agents and giving train the trainer sessions to department coaches. 

As a project manager identifying training needs, developing training plans accordingly and getting the management on board.

Conducting individual coaching sessions with managers and employees.
profile_positions.title: Trainer/Coach/Developer/Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Managing a team of 20 call agents at the sales and service department. Through team coaching and one on one coaching sessions helping call agents improve on their skills, competence and motivation, thereby achieving team targets concerning sales, quality and handling time.

Guiding the employees through the department reduction due to a big reorganisation that would lead to closure of the Amsterdam location.
profile_positions.title: Unitmanager/Coach Sales and Service

profile_positions.description: Developing training material and giving training sessions concerning the implementation of a new I-procurement system in the entire hospital organisation, affecting 600 users.
profile_positions.title: Trainer/Developer

profile_positions.description:
Integrating a brand new general practice in the hospital organisation. 
Managing the day-to-day operations on the business side of the practice. Primary goals: improve efficiency, maximise revenues, minimise costs. Managing the practice assistants and their replacements regarding administrative tasks.
profile_positions.title: Operational Manager of the General Practice

profile_positions.description: Acquisition of vacancies at different organisations, recruitment and selection of personnel, making optimal matches between candidates and vacancies/companies.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: Servicing and executing projects for the UK and Northern Irish market.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator/Customer Service Coordinator
